channel.title: University of Bristol news
channel.description: Latest news from the University of Bristol

item.title: Record turnout for David Attenborough lecture
item.description: Last night [24 September] Sir David Attenborough delivered a lecture on Alfred Russel Wallace and the Birds of Paradise to a capacity audience at the University. More than 850 people packed the Great Hall in the Wills Memorial Building to hear the legendary and much-loved broadcaster speak.
